channel.title: Getting-starteds on Eyeson API documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Getting-starteds on Eyeson API documentation

item.title: How to get started
item.description: To start a fully featured video conference all you have to do is send a single request to the Eyeson API. The Eyeson services organize video conferences in rooms. After you create a room the API provides you with an URL you can use to send a user to the Eyeson web GUI. The web GUI is hosted by the Eyeson team and ensures regular updates with the latest features as well as a stable and well designed user experience.
